name: Apricot Bellini
description: This spin on a bellini adapted from 101 Champagne Cocktails by Kim Haasarud is a little richer, a little boozier, and a little more fun than your standard brunch drink.

recipeInstructions.text: Combine apricot nectar, cognac, and apricot brandy in a cocktail shaker with ice. Shake vigorously. Strain into a chilled champagne flute.
Add sparkling wine and stir gently. Garnish with a mint sprig and serve immediately.
